name: "Don't Look"
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Terrors to call out a Dude in the same or adjacent location. If the Dude has a lower Value than your Terror, he or she cannot refuse.

name: "Gordo" Andrade Exp.
effect: Experienced. Gordo may have 2 ready Weapons. Shootout: Target a ready Weapon attached to Gordo. One action on that Weapon may be used an additional time this turn.

name: "Is This Your Card?"
effect: Noon: Target a Huckster in play. The Huckster gains +1 Influence until after nightfall.

name: "Little Shaky there, Pardner?"
effect: Shootout: Target a Dude in this shootout. The Dude's Bullet rating is reduced to 0 until the end of the shootout. This action cannot be played in the first round of a shootout.

name: "Not So Fast!"
effect: Reaction: Play when a Dude moves to a location you own. Target and boot the Dude.

name: "Not Who You Were Expectin'?"
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. The next card you put into play from your play hand has its ghost rock cost reduced to 0. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: "Now, is That on Three…?"
effect: Shootout: You may perform two consecutive shootout actions immediately after this one.

name: "Oops…"
effect: Noon: Target a deed worth at least 1 Control Point. The deed's Control Points are reduced by 2 (minimum 0) until after Nightfall.

name: "Tabitha"
effect: Abomination. Cannot attach Goods. "Tabitha" may only enter play if the Fear level is above 5. Shootout: Play when Tabitha is the only Dude in your posse. She becomes a Stud and gains a +2 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout.

name: "Watch the Floor"
effect: Noon: Target a location you control. The next time one or more Dudes move to the target location, each Dude must pull: If the pull is greater than the Dude's Value, the Dude is sent home booted. If the pull is greater than the value plus 5, the Dude is aced. This action has no cost if J.P. Coleman is at the target location.

name: "What's that Ticking…?"
effect: Reaction: Target a Dude immediately after he or she moves to a Deed you control and have at least one Dude at. Send all of your Dudes at the Deed home booted. The target's controller must Pull: If the pull is greater than the target's Value, he or she is aced.

name: "You Goin' Somewhere?"
effect: Reaction: Play when a Dude moves out of a location. Boot one of your Dudes at the same location to cancel the move. Any costs of the move (such as booting) remain paid.

name: "You Lookin' For This?"
effect: Noon: Target a Deed. Boot all Dudes at the Deed with 0 Influence.

name: "…Or after Three?"
effect: Shootout: Play when the number of Dudes in the opposing posse exceeds the number of Dudes in your posse by 2 or more. Your opponent's Draw hand in this shootout round is reduced by 2 ranks (and is considered the best hand of that rank).

name: 34 Days Without a Bath
effect: Reaction: Play after you move a Dude with 0 Influence to an in-town Deed. Until after Nightfall, all Dudes have a -1 Influence penalty (minimum 0) while at the Deed.

name: A Job Well Done
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before you begin a job targeting a card or location controlled by another player. If the job is sucessful, you gain one Victory Point. Ace this card.

name: Animate Hand
effect: Abomination. There is no limit to the number of Animate Hands that each player may have in play. Animate Hands cannot attach Goods. Card memory does not apply to Animate Hands. Any Dudes with higher Values in a posse opposing an Animate Hand have the ability - Shootout: Boot this Dude to ace an Animate Hand in the opposing posse. Reduce this Dude's Bullet rating to 0 until the end of the shootout.

name: Ascendance
effect: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Lost Angel Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Lost Angel Dude in this location.

name: Ashlar Mayfair
effect: Non-Unique. Huckster:0 Shootout: Attach a Hex from your Play hand to Ashlar. Ashlar becomes a Stud until the end of the shootout.

name: Automaton Factory
effect: Private. Gadget Deed Difficulty: 8 You must boot a Mad Scientist and perform a skill check to put this Deed into play. Controller Noon: Discard a card from your Play hand to create an Automaton at your home (use the discarded card to represent it). The Automaton is a 1 Draw, 0 Influence, Ace-value Gadget token Dude, which counts as 2 Dudes when acing casualties in a shootout. Discard the Automaton after Nightfall. This action may be used any number of times per turn.

name: Bait and Switch
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets another player's Home. If the job succeeds, that player's maximum hand size is reduced by 1 until the end of the game, and that player must immediately discard down to his or her new maximum hand size if possible. All Dudes in your Posse become Wanted. A player may not be targeted more than once per game with "Bait and Switch".

name: Bi-Plane
effect: Horse. Gadget Difficulty:5 Shootout: Target a Horse in the opposing posse and pull; if the pull is greater than the target's Value, it is aced. If the pull is red and also greater than the Value of the Dude of the target is attached to, the Dude is aced as well.

name: Bill Jefferson
effect: Bill's Upkeep cost is 0 while you have Nash Bilton in play.

name: Bilton Protection Agency
effect: Private. The Production of the Protection Agency is increased by +2 while you have Nash Bilton in play. Controller Shootout: Move one of your Dudes at this location into the current shootout.

name: Blood of Gold
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Reaction: When this Dude is aced, perform a pull as if he or she were Harrowed (this is not a Harrowed Pull)." Ace this card.

name: Bloody Ones
effect: Non-Unique. Abomination. Cannot attach Goods. Shootout: Ace one of your Dudes in this location to make the Bloody Ones a Stud until the end of the shootout.

name: Bob Bidwell Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: All players may reveal their Play hands. Pull 3 times: Players that reveal their Play hand must discard any cards with the same Values (ignoring suits) as the pulls. Players that reveal their Play hand may either gain 3 ghost rock or give one of their Dudes a +2 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

name: Boomtown of Soddum
effect: Public. Out of Town. Lost Angels may move from this Deed to the Town Square without booting.

name: Bradley Sloane
effect: Non-Unique. Bradley gains a +2 Influence bonus while he has a Gadget Horse attached. Shootout: Target a Goods in the opposing posse. Boot a Gadget Horse attached to Bradley to ace the target Goods.

name: Brigadier-General Patterson Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shootout: Boot one of your Dudes in this posse with a lower Value than Patterson. Patterson gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout. This action may be performed any number of times per turn.

name: Burnin' the Midnight Oil
effect: Noon: Target one of your Dudes. One skill rating on the Dude is increased by 3 until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, the Dude's Value is lowered by 3 (minimum Ace) and the Dude may not move to another location.

name: Capt. Allen Graham
effect: Captain Graham may not be Harrowed. The first time that Captain Graham is aced during the game, he is not aced but is sent home booted instead with a permanent -1 Bullet penalty and -1 Influence penalty.

name: Cardsharp
effect: Noon Hex 7: If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster gains a +3 to his or her Huckster rating until after Nightfall.

name: Caroline
effect: Unique. Improvement. This Improvement may only be attached to a Brothel. Owner Noon: Target a Dude in this location. Until after Nightfall, that Dude has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) while at any other location.

name: Carson Gage
effect: When Gage enters play from your Play hand, draw a card from your deck and add it to your Play hand.

name: Chain Gang
effect: The ghost rock cost of this Improvement is 0 for the Law Dogs and Texas Rangers. This Improvement may only be attached to a Strike. While the Chain Gang is attached to a Strike, the Owner of the Strike collects its Production even if that player does not control it.

name: Chao Li Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:2 Noon: Discard a Hex attached to Chao Li to target a Dude at this location. Give the Dude either a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0), a -2 Influence penalty (minimum 0), or reduce his or her Value by two (minimum Ace), until after Nightfall.

name: Charity
effect: Noon Pull: Boot Charity to target a Dude in the Town Square. If the pull is greater than the Dude's Value, unboot Charity and move the Dude to Charity's location.

name: Chen Li
effect: Kung-Fu. May not attach Weapons. Reaction: When you win a round of a shootout, boot Chen to draw cards equal to the number of ready Weapons in the opposing posse, and add them to your Play hand.

name: Chiang Shen
effect: Non-Unique. Kung-Fu. Chiang may have 2 ready Weapons.

name: Collegium Airstrip
effect: Public. Out of Town. Controller Reaction: Boot this Deed when you bring a Gadget Horse into play from your Play hand. The ghost rock cost of the Gadget Horse is reduced by 3 (minimum 0).

name: Collegium- Wasatch Rails
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:21 Noon: Boot Wasatch Rails to get a Gadget from your deck or discard pile, show it to the other players, and add it to your Play hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Consecrated Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Ace the Consecrated Bullets. Until the end of the shootout, all illegal Draw hands are reduced by 3 ranks and are considered the worst possible hand of that rank.

name: Crossfire
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets another player's Home. If the job succeeds, the text box on that player's Outfit card is considered blank until after Nightfall next turn, and all Dudes in your Posse become Wanted. Ace this card.

name: Crumbling Dam
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Noon: Target a Kung-Fu power on a Dude at this location. The Dude loses the power perminantly." Ace this card.

name: Cup of Joe
effect: Noon: Target one of your booted Dudes. The Dude is unbooted, but has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) and a -1 Influence penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall.

name: Davidson Consulting
effect: Private. The Upkeep cost and Influence of the owner's Dudes are reduced by 1 (minimum 0). This does not apply to Terrors or Dudes from other outfits. A Sweetrock player may choose to start with this Deed in play, as if it were a starting Dude. Controller Noon: Boot this Deed to discard one of your Dudes or the Deed itself.

name: Deluge
effect: Huckster:1 Noon: Target a Hex in this location attached to another Dude. Until after Nightfall, Deluse is considered to have a copy of that Hex attached.

name: Deputized Civilian
effect: Non-Unique. The Civilian gains a +1 Bullet bonus while he has a ready Weapon with "Shotgun" in its title or as a trait.

name: Dim Eyes
effect: Mystical. This Dude's skills are increased by 1 while Dim Eyes is attached.

name: Dirt-Faced Figueroa
effect: Dirt-Face may not be selected as a starting Dude. Any player, as a Noon action, may pay 3 ghost rock to have Dirt-Face placed in his Owner's discard pile.

name: Discipline
effect: Noon: Give a Maze Rats Dude a +1 Bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (Maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Disrepair
effect: You may only attach this Improvement to a Deed that you own but do not control. This Deed is worth 0 Control Points and has 0 Upkeep and Production while this Improvement is attached. Owner Noon: Discard this Improvement.

name: Dream Walk
effect: Noon Spirit 8: Target a Dude controlled by another player. If this Spirit succeeds, and the Dude belongs to a different outfit than his or her controller, the Dude is discarded.

name: Drunken Monkey Technique
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Noon: Call out a Dude at this location. If this location is a saloon, the call-out may not be refused." Ace this card.

name: Dust to Dust
effect: Noon Miracle X: Target a dude. X is the Value of a target Dude. If this Miracle succeeds and there is another Dude in play with the same name as the target, the target Dude is Aced.

name: Duvalier's Field Office
effect: Private. Out of town. Controller Reaction: Immediately before the Upkeep phase, target an in-town Deed with Production greater than 0. The Deed gains +1 Production until after Nightfall.

name: Edward Randolph III
effect: Lycanthrope. Noon: Boot one of your Mad Scientists at this location to put any one Abomination into play from your Play hand in place of Edward (ignoring all costs and restrictions), and put Edward into your Play hand with all of his attached cards.

name: Elizabeth Goldstein
effect: Non-Unique. If there was a shootout during this turn, Elizabeth gains a +2 Influence bonus during Nightfall.

name: Enter the Dragon
effect: Until after Nightfall, Dudes controlled by a player with more than 8 ghost rock in their vault are considered Wanted. Ace this card.

name: Eye Doctor
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Target on of your Dudes with Influence greater than 0. The Dude has a -1 Influence penalty (minimum 0) and a +1 Bullet bonus, until after Nightfall.

name: Eyes in the Back of My Head
effect: Shootout: Target an action from a Kung-Fu Power on a Dude in this shootout. That action cannot be used during this shootout. If the action has already been used during this shootout, any current effects are negated.

name: Ezra Whateley
effect: Huckster:1 Ezra must pull twice when performing a Hex skill check. If either pull fails, the Hex is unsuccessful.

name: Faith
effect: Noon: Give a Lost Angles dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Fallen Minion
effect: Non-Unique. The Fallen Minion may attach Miracles and Hexes. The Fallen Minion may attach a Walking Stick for free if he does not have one. Noon: Give the Fallen Minion either the Huckster: 0 or Blessed: 0 trait until after Nightfall.

name: Fear
effect: Noon: Give a Whateley dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Fickle Fortune Strike
effect: Private. Strike. The Controller of this Strike collects its production during the Upkeep phase instead of the owner.

name: Fineas Von Landingham Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Mad Scientist:2 Noon: If Fineas does not have a Horse attached, discard a card from your Play hand and boot Fineas to get a Gadget Horse from your deck or discard pile. Show the card to your opponents and add it to your Play hand, then shuffle your deck.

name: Flying Claw
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Shootout: Discard a card from your Play hand to give this Dude a +3 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout." Ace this card.

name: Gaping Maw
effect: Shootout: Target one of your Terrors in this shootout. If the Terror is your lead shooter during this round of the shootout, your hand rank is increased by one (but considered the worst possible hand of that rank).

name: Gareth
effect: Non-Unique. Noon: Look at another player's Play hand. That player may then discard their Play hand to draw an equal number of cards from their deck.

name: Ghost Dance
effect: Noon: Give a Sioux dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Ghostrock Cannon
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:8 You must discard a card from your Play hand to move this Dude. Noon: Target an adjacent location. Noon: Target an adjacent location. Noon Pull: Target an adjacent location that this Cannon has targeted twice this turn. All Dudes in that location with a Value less than the Pull are aced. This action cannot be used the turn this Cannon enters play.

name: Gift of the Thunderbird
effect: Mystical. The cost of Gift of the Thunderbird is reduced to 0 when being attached to a Sioux or Texas Ranger Dude. Noon: Ace Gift of the Thunderbird to target a Huckster in this or an adjacent location. All Hexes attached to the Huckster are aced.

name: Grady Murdock
effect: While Grady is your lead shooter during a shootout, Grady's Bullet rating is equal to the Bullet rating of the lead shooter in the opposing posse.

name: Greed
effect: Noon: Give a Sweetrock dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Greener Pastures
effect: Noon: Give a Blackjacks dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Gulgoleth
effect: Public. Out of Town. Haunted. Controller Reaction: Immediately after one of your Dudes is aced, boot Gulgoleth to return to your discard pile (instead of Boot Hill) all cards attached to that Dude.

name: Gun Shop
effect: Private. While the Gun Shop is in play, Dudes with a ready Weapon gain a +1 Influence bonus.

name: Hang Glider
effect: Horse. Gadget Difficulty:3 Noon: Move this Dude from a Strike to the Town Square or vice-versa.

name: Hardinger-One
effect: Unique. Improvement.

name: Harley, Son of David
effect: Non-Unique. You may attach a Mechanical Horse to Harley, Son of David from your Play hand without a skill check and without booting a Mad Scientist. The ghost rock cost of the Mechanical Horse must still be paid. Harley will not trade away a Mechanical Horse.

name: Honor
effect: Noon: Give a Law Dogs dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Horse Whispers
effect: Noon Spirit 7: If this Spirit succeeds, get one non-Gadget Horse from your deck or discard pile, show it to your opponents, and add it to your Play hand. Shuffle your deck. Reaction Spirit 6: Play after Draw hands are compared in a shootout. If this Spirit succeeds, you may ace any number of non-Gadget Horses in your posse. Each Horse aced reduces your casualties by one.

name: Howard Findley Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Noon: Boot Findley to gain ghost rock equal to his Influence. Findley has a -3 Influence penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall.

name: Imprisonment
effect: Noon Hex X: Target a Dude at this location. X is equal to the target's Value plus Influence plus Bullet rating. If this Hex succeeds, the Dude is turned face-down until after Nightfall next turn. While face-down, the Dude is considered out of play except for uniqueness purposes.

name: Iron Dragon Arsenal
effect: Private. The controller of this Deed may attach Goods to his or her Dudes at this Deed for 1 less ghost rock (minimum 0).

name: It's Always Darkest…
effect: Starting with the Winner and going clockwise, each player may boot one of their Terrors. When a Terror boots in this way, all Dudes in play with both lower Value and Influence than the Terror are booted. Ace this card.

name: It's That Simple
effect: Shootout: Target a printed Shootout action on one of your Dudes in this shootout and another Dude in that posse. The target Dude is considered to have the ability until after this round of the shootout.

name: Jade King Stance
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Shootout: Target a Dude in the opposing posse with a lower Value and Bullet rating than this Dude. Boot this Dude to send the target Dude home booted." Ace this card.

name: Jason "The Kid" Jung
effect: All Deeds with "Laundry" in their title or traits are worth 1 extra Control Point while "The Kid" is in play. Noon: Discard a card from your Play hand to call out a Dude in this location. If you control this location, the call out may not be refused.

name: Jebediah Whateley Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:2 Reaction: When a Spell attached to Jebediah is aced, discard it instead.

name: Jinx
effect: Noon Hex X: Target a skilled Dude in the same or adjacent location. X is twice the Dude's highest skill rating. If this Hex succeeds, the Dude automatically fails all skill checks until after Nightfall.

name: Judge Fayllen Wells
effect: Reaction: When another player reveals an illegal Draw hand during a shootout, boot Fayllen to target a Dude in that player's posse. If the Dude is Wanted, he or she is aced. Otherwise, the Dude becomes Wanted. Cheatin'! cards may not be played on that player during this draw, and this action cannot be used if one has already been played.

name: Kang's Pride
effect: Unique. Horse. Gadget Difficulty:8 Can only be put into play by a Maze Rats player. Noon: Boot Kang's Pride to move this Dude and any number of your other Dudes at this location to another location.

name: Karl Rundgren
effect: Karl becomes Wanted when he enters play. Noon: Boot Karl to gain 2 ghost rock. Karl becomes Wanted.

name: Katie Karl's Calibrated Pistols
effect: Unique. Weapon. The cost of the Pistols is 0 when being attached to Katie Karl. The cost of the Pistols cannot be reduced when being attached to another Dude. This Dude is a Stud. Reaction: Use after casualties are aced in a shootout round you have won. The opposing player must pull for each surviving member of his posse. If the pull is greater than the Dude's Value, the Dude is aced.

name: Killer Kerry Exp.
effect: Experienced. You may attach a Pocket Watch to Kerry without cost and without a skill check. Noon: Target a Dude in this or an adjacent location with 2 Influence. Boot the target Dude.

name: Kyle Conrad
effect: Kyle's Influence is 0 while he does not have a Sidekick attached. Kyle will not trade away a Sidekick. Noon: If Kyle does not have a Sidekick attached, boot Kyle to attach a Sidekick to him from your Play hand at no cost.

name: Leopard and Her Cubs
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Shootout: Kung-Fu Dudes in your posse other than the Shooter provide both a 1 card Draw and Stud bonus during this round of the shootout." Ace this card.

name: Light Stalker
effect: Blessed:1 When attaching a Weapon with "Shotgun" in its title or traits to Light Stalker, reduce the Weapon's ghost rock cost by 2 (minimum 0).

name: Lost in the Crowd
effect: Noon: Target an unbooted Dude at a Deed. Until after Nightfall, the Dude does not contribute his or her Unfluence when determining control of that Deed.

name: Lt. Colonel Devon Graves
effect: Shootout: Target a Dude in the opposing posse with a Value less than or equal to the number of Dudes in your Posse. Boot Graves to ace that Dude.

name: Lyle's Aquatic Emporium
effect: Public. Owner Reaction: Immediately after a shootout ends in the Emporium, move all Dudes in the Emporium to the Town Square, booted.

name: Lyndon Station
effect: Public. Out of Town. Saloon. The Lyndon Station is adjacent to the Far Away Strike. Draw Dudes have a -1 Influence penalty (minimum 0) while at this location.

name: Manhunt
effect: Noon job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets another player's Home. If the job succeeds, you may look through the target's deck and ace up to 3 Events from their deck and/or discard pile. Then reshuffle the deck. All Dudes in your posse that are not Law Dogs, Texas Rangers, or Agency become Wanted. Ace this card.

name: Mantis Pinch
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Shootout: Target a Stud in the opposing posse. The Dude is a Draw until the end of the shootout." Ace this card.

name: Mary the Wanderer Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Move Mary from one in-town location to another. Noon: Move Mary from an out-of-town location to an in-town location.

name: Master Chan
effect: Kung-Fu. Noon: Boot Chan and discard a card from your Play hand to get a Kung-Fu Power from your deck or discard pile. Show it to your opponents and add it to your Play hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Maze Rats- Iron Dragon
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:18 All of your Dudes with one or more Kung-Fu Powers gain a +1 Influence bonus. Noon: Boot one of your Dudes to call out a Dude at the same location with a Weapon attached. The call-out cannot be refused.

name: Mob Justice
effect: Reaction: Target a Wanted Dude who is performing an action that could make the Dude Wanted if he or she wasn't already. Boot a number of your Dudes greater than the target's Bullet rating to ace the target Dude.

name: Nash Bilton Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Nash's Upkeep cost is 0 while you control the Bilton Protection Agency. Shootout: Pay 2 ghost rock to move Nash into the current shootout.

name: Nicodemus Whateley Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Huckster:4 Noon: Ace a Spell attached to Nicodemus to move him to another location. You may perform this action any number of times per turn.

name: Old Friends Come Knockin'
effect: All Experienced Dudes in play gain an Influence bonus equal to their level of Experience (e.g. an Experienced 2 Dude gains a +2 Influence bonus).

name: Oliver Kingsley
effect: Mad Scientist:2 Oliver may only create Weapon Gadgets.

name: Oswald's New Chair
effect: Unique. Mystical. Gadget Difficulty:7 This Dude gains a +2 Influence and his or her Value is increased by 4. This Goods may only be traded once per game. Noon: Move this Dude to another location. Shootout: Target a Dude in the opposing posse. The target is booted. If the target was already booted and has a lower Value than this Dude's Influence, the target is aced.

name: Out of Range
effect: Shootout: All Weapons in this shootout without the word "Rifle" in their title or traits are considered unready until the end of the shootout.

name: Overawe
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target on of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Shootout: Target a Dude in the opposing Posse. Until the end of the shootout, the target has a Bullet penalty (minimum 0) equal to this Dude's Influence." Ace this card.

name: Palm of Prevention
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Shootout: Target an action printed on a Dude in the opposing posse. The action may not be used until after Nightfall." Ace this card.

name: Peevie Exp.
effect: Experienced. Whenever you win a round of a shootout and Peevie is your lead shooter, the opposing posse suffers an additional two casualties. When you win a round of a shootout and Peevie is in your posse, you gain 2 ghost rock.

name: Pepper Box Hold-Out
effect: Weapon. Derringer. Shootout: Target a Dude in your posse. Attach the Pepper Box Hold-Out from your Play hand to the target Dude.

name: Peter Motambu
effect: Non-Unique. Shootout: Target a Harrowed Dude in the opposing posse. Boot Peter and give him a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall to ace the target Dude.

name: Phantasm
effect: Reaction Hex 3: Target a Dude when he or she enters play. If this Hex succeeds, the Dude is booted.

name: Plague of Locusts
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Boot one of your Blessed to target one of that player's Dudes with a lower Value and Influence than your Blessed. Ace the target Dude. Only one Cheatin'! Card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Po Yu Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Huckster:3 Kung-Fu. Shootout: Target a Maze Rat in this shootout. The Maze Rat gains a Bullet bonus equal to Po Yu's Huckster rating until the end of the shootout.

name: Pocket Strike
effect: Non-Unique. Private. Strike. There is no limit to the number of Pocket Strikes that a player may have in play. Card Memory does not apply to Pocket Strikes.

name: Previous Tennant
effect: Dudes controlled by a player other than the Owner have a -1 Influence (minimum 0) while at this Deed.

name: Private Daniel Phelts
effect: Kung-Fu.

name: Professor Crowe
effect: Mad Scientist:3 Noon: Boot Professor Crowe to target a Mad Scientist at this location. Until after Nightfall, the target's Mad Scientist skill is increased by Professor Crowe's Mad Scientist skill.

name: Quick Getaway
effect: Shootout: Boot one of your Dudes in this shootout to move him or her out of the shootout to any location in play.

name: R.H. II
effect: Unique. Sidekick. Gadget Difficulty:4 While R.H. II is attached to a Dude in a shootout, he is considered a Dude in the posse and has a 1 Stud Bullet rating. If R.H. II is moved out of the shootout, he boots, is still attached to this Dude and is no longer considered a Dude. If R.H. II is aced in a shootout, he is not aced but discarded instead.

name: Reason
effect: Noon: Give a Collegium dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Rebel Pride
effect: Noon: Give a Texas Rangers dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Rev. Noah Whateley
effect: Huckster:0 The Reverend may be targeted as though he were a Blessed. The Reverend's Hexes are also considered Miracles. Noon: If the Reverend's Value is greater than Ace, permanently reduce his Value by 2 (minimum A) to increase his Huckster skill by 2 until after Nightfall.

name: Robert Jones
effect: Robert Jones may have two ready Weapons, and receives a +1 Bullet bonus for each Weapon he has ready.

name: Roger and Spencer .44
effect: Weapon. Reaction: Play after Draw hands are compared in a shootout. Boot the .44 if you have a hand rank equal to or better than a Full House, but lost this round of the shootout. The opposing posse suffers a casualty.

name: Roughneck Mack
effect: Reaction: After you have drawn your Draw hand in a shootout, but before you exchange cards using your Draw bonuses, discard 2 cards from your Draw hand to draw 2 new cards. You may only use this action if Mack is your lead Shooter.

name: Running Moose
effect: During shootouts, Running Moose has an additional Bullet bonus equal to the number of Shaman in his posse.

name: Ruth Whateley
effect: During a shootout, Ruth gains a +1 Bullet bonus for each Huckster in her posse.

name: Sacred Ground
effect: Shootout Spirit 6: If this Spirit succeeds and you own this location, this Shaman gains a +3 Bullet bonus and becomes a Stud until the end of the shootout.

name: Second Shadow
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target on of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Reaction: After another non-harrowed Dude has been aced in this location, boot this Dude to gain a perminant +1 Bullet bonus." Ace this card.

name: Secret Paths
effect: Noon Spirit 6: If this Spirit succeeds, this Shaman gains a +3 to his or her Shaman rating until after Nightfall.

name: Security Guard
effect: Non-Unique. While the Security Guard is in a posse, effects that raise or lower hand ranks have no effect.

name: Seizing the Pearl of Death
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Reaction: Boot this Dude after you reveal Draw hands in a shootout and this Dude in in your posse. Your posse suffers one less casualty." Ace this card.

name: Shady Jake's
effect: Public. Casino. Controller Noon: All players must place 1 ghost rock (if able) on this Deed. At the end of Nightfall, the current controller gains the ghost rock on this Deed. If this Deed leaves play, return the ghost rock to the Bank.

name: Shi Kuan
effect: Harrowed. Kung-Fu.

name: Shouting Tom's Tunnel
effect: Private. Strike. Controller Reaction: Boot this Strike immediately before the Upkeep phase. If you do not have any ghost rock in your Vault, gain 3 ghost rock.

name: Silver Wolf
effect: Shaman:1 Silver Wolf has a +1 Influence bonus for each other unbooted Shaman at his location.

name: Silver-Tongued Devil
effect: Noon Hex X: Declare a number from 1 to 5. X is three times the declared number. If this hex succeeds, this Huckster gains an Influence bonus equal to the number until after Nightfall, and this Hex is aced. If this Hex fails, this Huckster loses one Influence permanently (minimum 0).

name: Sister Leila
effect: Sister Leila gains a +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for each Mystical Goods she has attached.

name: Smiling Lizard Lode Exp.
effect: Experienced. Private. Strike. Any Dude that is not a Terror has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) while at this location. Controller Noon: Ace this Deed to discard all Dudes at this Deed.

name: Solomon
effect: Blessed:2 Noon: Boot Solomon to draw a card and add it to your Play hand.

name: Spirit Bond
effect: Noon: Target two of your Dudes at the same location. Until after Nightfall, and while they are at a different location, the Dudes gain a +1 Influence bonus and have their Value increased by 3.

name: Sprinkler System
effect: You must boot a Mad Scientist to put this card into play. Owner Reaction: Play immediately before this Deed is aced. Ace this Improvement instead of this Deed.

name: Startin' Over
effect: Players cannot gain ghost rock during High Noon this turn.

name: Step Back to Ward Off Monkey
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Shootout: Move this Dude home, booted." Ace this card.

name: Steve Elfinbein
effect: While you have Steve in play, any time a Joker is part of your final Draw hand during a shootout, your hand rank is increased by 1 rank and is considered the worst possible hand of that rank. If you ever lose a round of a shootout, Steve is discarded from play.

name: Strike Experiment #3.1
effect: Private. Strike. The production of this Strike is equal to the highest Mad Scientist rating in play.

name: Tai Ch'I Technique
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the card text: "Card effects cannot ace this Dude. This will not prevent a Dude from being aced as a result of a shootout." Ace this card.

name: Teresa Howe
effect: Blessed:0 Teresa gains a +3 bonus to her Blessed skill while in a shootout.

name: The 37th Chamber
effect: Non-Unique. Kung-Fu.

name: The Amazing Xemo Exp.
effect: Experienced. Mad Scientist:1 Reaction: Boot Xemo before you draw your Draw hand during the Gambling phase. If the top card of your discard pile is an Event, put it on top of your deck.

name: The Ancients
effect: Non-Unique. The Ancients may boot to join a posse as if they were in an adjacent location.

name: The Bloodless
effect: Non-Unique. The Bloodless may not call out other Dudes.

name: The Claw
effect: Gadget Difficulty:6 Shootout: Target a Dude in the opposing posse. The Dude is sent home, booted.

name: The Damacles
effect: Unique. Horse. Gadget Difficulty:7 Can only be put into play by a Collegium player. Attaches to Fineas von Landingham without cost. Shootout: Boot the Damacles to move this Dude and any number of your other Dudes in this location into the current shootout, or out of the shootout, booted.

name: The Gauntlet
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes with the Kung-Fu trait to target another of your Dudes in the same location with a lower Value. Boot the target Dude. Until the end of the game that Dudes has the Kung-Fu trait. Ace this card.

name: The Last Kingdom
effect: Until after Nightfall, the Fear level is increased by 2, and all Dudes with Huckster, Blessed, Shaman and Mad Scientist skills gain a +2 bonus to their skill.

name: The Lurking Fear
effect: Spells targeting the Lurking Fear have their difficulty increased by 4.

name: The Master's Dojo
effect: Private. Out of Town. Controller Noon: Boot this Deed and target one of your Kung-Fu Dudes. The Dude gains a +1 Bullet Bonus until after Nightfall for each Kung-Fu Power he has. Controller Shootout: Boot this Deed and target one of your Kung-Fu Dudes in this shootout. The Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout for each Kung-Fu Power he has.

name: The Quarantine Ends!
effect: Until after Nightfall, no player may win the game unless he or she has the most (or tied for the most) total bullets in play. Ace this card.

name: The Sky is Falling
effect: Until after Nightfall, actions printed on Dudes may not be used.

name: The Swarm
effect: Non-Unique. May not move to in-town Deeds. The Swarm can only be put into play by a Maze Rats player. Noon: Move this Dude to a Strike.

name: The Troupe
effect: Public. Controller Noon: Target a Spell attached to one of your Dudes that has been used this turn. The Spell may be used again this turn. The Dude that has the Spell attached becomes Wanted and the Spell is aced after Nightfall if still in play.

name: The Undermaze
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Theodore White
effect: Mad Scientist:3 Theodore may only create Horse Gadgets.

name: Timmy Derrick Exp.
effect: Experienced. Only Terrors can call out Timmy. Shootout Pull: Target a Dude in the opposing posse. If the pull plus Timmy's Value is greater than the Dude's Value, the Dude is a Draw and has his or her Bullet rating reduced to 0 until the end of the shootout.

name: Tucker Hastings
effect: Tucker has +1 Production while he is in a Saloon. Noon: Play when Tucker is in a Saloon. Target another Dude in the Saloon to move that Dude to the Town Square, booted.

name: Turnabout's Fair Play
effect: Reaction: Play when a player recieves ghost rock as a result of a card effect. The player does not gain the ghost rock, and must pay that amount to the Bank instead, up to the total amount in his or her Vault.

name: Unearthly Beacon
effect: Noon Hex 8: Boot this Huckster to target a Dude in your discard pile. If this Hex is successful, put the target into play, normally. The target's ghost rock cost is reduced by the Huckster's skill.

name: Union Withdrawal
effect: All Drifters and all Dudes controlled by outfits of a different faction than their controller have their Values reduced by 5 (minimum A) until after Nightfall.

name: Vampiric Dance Hall Girl
effect: Abomination. For each dude that is aced at the same location, the Vampiric Dance Hall Girl gains +1 Bullet until after Nightfall.

name: Victory Springs
effect: Private. During each round of a shootout at this location, the losing posse suffers one additional casualty.

name: Vigilance Ranch
effect: Private. Out of Town. Harrowed Dudes and hucksters have +2 Influence for purposes of controlling this Deed.

name: Water Lou's
effect: Non-Unique. Public. Saloon. Any Dude aced while at Water Lou's is removed from play permanently. No other copy of that Dude may enter play for the rest of the game.

name: Watering Trough
effect: Controller Noon: Target a Horse at this Deed. The Horse is unbooted, and actions on the Horse may be used an additional time this turn.

name: Whateleys- Black Circle
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Reaction: When one of your Dudes is targeted with an action. Ace a Spell attached to one of your Dudes to cancel the action.

name: Widow Withers
effect: Non-Unique. Only Hucksters may call out the Widow Withers.

name: Wild Dingos
effect: Sidekick. Noon: Target a Dude in this location. Boot Wild Dingos to call out the target Dude, who cannot refuse. Reaction: Perform immediately after Draw hands are compared in a shootout and you have lost the round. Ace Wild Dingos to reduce your casualties by 2. The attached Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus and is a Stud for the next round of the shootout.

name: William Rose Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Call out a Dude at this location. You may only use this action if William is Wanted.

name: Windows Derek Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction: When a player targets another one of your Dudes in this location with an action, boot Windows to cancel the action.

name: Wing Chun Technique
effect: Noon Kung-Fu Power: Target one of your unbooted Kung-Fu Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Reaction: Play after this Dude's posse wins a round of a shootout. This Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout, and the opposing posse may not chicken out of this shootout." Ace this card.

name: Yankee Pride
effect: Noon: Give an Agency dude a +1 bullet, +1 Influence, or +3 Value (maximum King) until after Nightfall.

name: Yung Kim
effect: Mad Scientist:0 Yung Kim gains a +3 bonus to his Mad Scientist skill while creating a Gadget Horse.

name: Zombie Miners
effect: Non-Unique. Abomination. The Upkeep cost of Zombie Miners is reduced by 1 (minimum 0) while controlled by a Maze Rats player. While the Zombie Miners are at a Strike you control, the Strike's production is increased by +2.

name: …Before the Dawn
effect: Harrowed Dudes do not make Harrowed Pulls this turn.
